cn.brainit.image

类 Filtering

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.brainit.image.Filtering

  • public class Filtering
extends java.lang.Object
    Image Filtering you may see more at http://www.cnblogs.com/libing64/archive/2011/12/14/2878737.html http://lodev.org/cgtutor/filtering.html
    作者:
    brainit brainit http://www.brainit.cn/

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      constructor of class Filtering with BufferedImage
      Filtering(java.io.File input)
      constructor of Class Filtering with ImageFile

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage filteringWithMean()
      filtering the image with mean of RGB gray = (g1 , g2 .... gn) mean = (g1 + g2 + ... + gn)/n
      void filteringWithMean(java.io.File output)
      output data to file get BufferedImage after filtering witht mean output the bufferedImage to file more info you may see filteringWithMean()
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage filteringWithMedian()
      filtering the image with median of neighbor gray = (g1 , g2 .... gn) neighbor(i,j) = {gray(i-1,j-1),gray(i,j-1),gray(i+1,j-1); gray(i-1,j),gray(i,j),gray(i+1,j); gray(i-1,j+1),gray(i,j+1),gray(i+1,j+1);} gray(i,j) = median(neighbor(i,j)) tips:the border will be kept with no change
      void filteringWithMedian(java.io.File output)
      output data to file get BufferedImage after filtering with median of neighbor output the bufferedImage to file more info you may see filteringWithMedian()
      int getGray(int x, int y)
      regarding the image as Gray Image get the gray level of target location
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Testing method

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • filteringWithMean

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage filteringWithMean()
        filtering the image with mean of RGB gray = (g1 , g2 .... gn) mean = (g1 + g2 + ... + gn)/n
        返回:
        the Image finished filtering

      • filteringWithMean

        public void filteringWithMean(java.io.File output)
        output data to file get BufferedImage after filtering witht mean output the bufferedImage to file more info you may see filteringWithMean()
        参数:
        output - destFile

      • filteringWithMedian

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage filteringWithMedian()
        filtering the image with median of neighbor gray = (g1 , g2 .... gn) neighbor(i,j) = {gray(i-1,j-1),gray(i,j-1),gray(i+1,j-1); gray(i-1,j),gray(i,j),gray(i+1,j); gray(i-1,j+1),gray(i,j+1),gray(i+1,j+1);} gray(i,j) = median(neighbor(i,j)) tips:the border will be kept with no change
        返回:
        the Image finished filtering with median

      • filteringWithMedian

        public void filteringWithMedian(java.io.File output)
        output data to file get BufferedImage after filtering with median of neighbor output the bufferedImage to file more info you may see filteringWithMedian()
        参数:
        output - destFile

      • getGray

        public int getGray(int x,
          int y)
        regarding the image as Gray Image get the gray level of target location
        参数:
        x - x
        y - y
        返回:
        the gray level of target location

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Testing method
        参数:
        args - system parameters
